properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required)[string] The name of the Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: location
properties.description: (Required)[string] The regional location where the Virtual Data Center will be created.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Description for the Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The Virtual Data Center ID.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The Server ID.

properties.name: nic_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The NIC ID.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required)[string] The protocol for the rule: TCP, UDP, ICMP, ANY.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The name of the firewall rule.

properties.name: source_mac
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Only traffic originating from the respective MAC address is allowed. Valid format: aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff.

properties.name: source_ip
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Only traffic originating from the respective IPv4 address is allowed.

properties.name: target_ip
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Only traffic directed to the respective IP address of the NIC is allowed.

properties.name: port_range_start
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Defines the start range of the allowed port (from 1 to 65534) if protocol TCP or UDP is chosen.

properties.name: port_range_end
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Defines the end range of the allowed port (from 1 to 65534) if the protocol TCP or UDP is chosen.

properties.name: icmp_type
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Defines the allowed type (from 0 to 254) if the protocol ICMP is chosen.

properties.name: icmp_code
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Defines the allowed code (from 0 to 254) if protocol ICMP is chosen.

properties.name: access_activity_log
properties.description: (Required) [Boolean] The group will be allowed to access the activity log.

properties.name: create_datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) [Boolean] The group will be allowed to create virtual data centers.

properties.name: create_snapshot
properties.description: (Optional) [Boolean] The group will be allowed to create snapshots.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) [string] A name for the group.

properties.name: reserve_ip
properties.description: (Optional) [Boolean] The group will be allowed to reserve IP addresses.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: (Optional) [string] The ID of the specific user to add to the group.

properties.name: location
properties.description: (Required)[string] The regional location for this IP Block: us/las, us/ewr, de/fra, de/fkb.

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required)[integer] The number of IP addresses to reserve for this block.

properties.name: ips
properties.description: (Computed)[integer] The list of IP addresses associated with this block.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Required)[string] The reserved IP address to be used in the IP failover group.

properties.name: lan_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a LAN.

properties.name: nicuuid
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a NIC.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The name of the LAN.

properties.name: public
properties.description: (Optional)[Boolean] Indicates if the LAN faces the public Internet (true) or not (false).

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required)[string] The name of the load balancer.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: nic_ids
properties.description: (Required)[list] A list of NIC IDs that are part of the load balancer.

properties.name: dhcp
properties.description: (Optional)[Boolean] Indicates if the load balancer will reserve an IP using DHCP.

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Optional)[string] IPv4 address of the load balancer.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a server.

properties.name: lan
properties.description: (Required)[integer] The LAN ID the NIC will sit on.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The name of the LAN.

properties.name: dhcp
properties.description: (Optional)[Boolean] Indicates if the NIC should get an IP address using DHCP (true) or not (false).

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Optional)[string] IP assigned to the NIC.

properties.name: firewall_active
properties.description: (Optional)[Boolean] If this resource is set to true and is nested under a server resource firewall, with open SSH port, resource must be nested under the NIC.

properties.name: nat
properties.description: (Optional)[Boolean] Boolean value indicating if the private IP address has outbound access to the public internet.

properties.name: ips
properties.description: (Computed) The IP address or addresses assigned to the NIC.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required)[string] The name of the server.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: cores
properties.description: (Required)[integer] Number of server CPU cores.

properties.name: ram
properties.description: (Required)[integer] The amount of memory for the server in MB.

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The availability zone in which the server should exist.

properties.name: licence_type
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Sets the OS type of the server.

properties.name: cpu_family
properties.description: (Optional)[string] Sets the CPU type. "AMD_OPTERON" or "INTEL_XEON". Defaults to "AMD_OPTERON".

properties.name: volume
properties.description: (Required) See the Volume section.

properties.name: nic
properties.description: (Required) See the NIC section.

properties.name: boot_volume
properties.description: (Computed) The associated boot volume.

properties.name: boot_cdrom
properties.description: (Computed) The associated boot drive, if any.

properties.name: boot_image
properties.description: [string] The image or snapshot UUID. May also be an image alias. It is required if licence_type is not provided.

properties.name: primary_nic
properties.description: (Computed) The associated NIC.

properties.name: primary_ip
properties.description: (Computed) The associated IP address.

properties.name: image_password
properties.description: (Computed) The associated IP address.

properties.name: ssh_key_path
properties.description: (Required)[list] List of paths to files containing a public SSH key that will be injected into ProfitBricks provided Linux images. Required for ProfitBricks Linux images. Required if image_password is not provided.

properties.name: image_password
properties.description: [string] Required if sshkey_path is not provided.

properties.name: edit_privilege
properties.description: (Required)[Boolean] The group has permission to edit privileges on this resource.

properties.name: group_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of the specific group containing the resource to update.

properties.name: resource_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of the specific resource to update.

properties.name: share_privilege
properties.description: (Required)[Boolean] The group has permission to share this resource.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of the Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required)[string] The name of the snapshot.

properties.name: volume_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of the specific volume to take the snapshot from.

properties.name: administrator
properties.description: (Required)[Boolean] The group has permission to edit privileges on this resource.

properties.name: email
properties.description: (Required)[string] An e-mail address for the user.

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: (Required)[string] A first name for the user.

properties.name: force_sec_auth
properties.description: (Required)[Boolean] Indicates if secure (two-factor) authentication should be enabled for the user (true) or not (false).

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: (Required)[string] A last name for the user.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Required)[string] A password for the user.

properties.name: datacenter_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a Virtual Data Center.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required)[string] The ID of a server.

properties.name: disk_type
properties.description: (Required)[string] The volume type: HDD or SSD.

properties.name: bus
properties.description: (Required)[Boolean] The bus type of the volume: VIRTIO or IDE.

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required)[integer] The size of the volume in GB.

properties.name: ssh_key_path
properties.description: (Required)[list] List of paths to files containing a public SSH key that will be injected into ProfitBricks provided Linux images. Required for ProfitBricks Linux images. Required if image_password is not provided.

properties.name: sshkey
properties.description: (Computed) The associated public SSH key.

properties.name: image_password
properties.description: [string] Required if sshkey_path is not provided.

properties.name: image_name
properties.description: [string] The image or snapshot UUID. May also be an image alias. It is required if licence_type is not provided.

properties.name: licence_type
properties.description: [string] Required if image_name is not provided.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The name of the volume.

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Optional)[string] The storage availability zone assigned to the volume: AUTO, ZONE_1, ZONE_2, or ZONE_3.
